remarks: Commutative/associative law for Abelian groups.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Apr-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
statement:
ablcom.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ablcom.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
abl32.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) $.
abl32.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
abl32.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
abl32.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
abl32 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( X .+ Y ) .+ Z ) = ( ( X .+ Z ) .+ Y ) ) $.
